short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Q-Tools is a Chrome extension that provides a suite of tools for students to enhance their learning experience in Canvas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Q-Tools, Your Study Companion, in Beta! 🎓🌐

Install it and get access to:

🤖 Qewy: A portable study friend for your academic journey
💬 Q-Chat: Integrated AI chat into each of your modules
📝 Q-Notes: AI-Generated Notes and Flash Cards
📁 Q-Layout: A customizable layout to suit your style

We want to create new tools based on your suggestions, making Q-Tools the ultimate learning extension for modern students.

As a Beta tester, your feedback is instrumental in shaping our product. Please share your thoughts and help us enhance Q-Tools for the better. 😊

Connect with us at contact@studenthub.study 📧

Don't forget to follow our Instagram @studenthubbb for updates and more!

For any questions or guidance, check out our FAQ at https://studenthub.study/faq to find answers and information.

Start exploring Q-Tools today and join the community redefining the future of learning! 👨‍💻🚀
